visualization_prompt: Create a Highcharts chartOptions object to render a spline chart with the title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart should have styled axes and labels with specific colors and font sizes. The data series should represent the monthly average temperature for a year. Additionally, the chart should have custom colors for the series and include other configurations such as chart margins, background, and legend.
visualization_explanation: The provided Highcharts chartOptions object configures a spline chart with a title 'Monthly Average Temperature'. The chart type is set to 'spline', and it includes a background color and specific margins for better visualization. The x-axis and y-axis are styled with custom colors and font sizes for labels and titles. The data series represents monthly average temperatures, with a custom color applied to the series. The legend is enabled and styled with a specific font color and size. Additionally, the spline plot options include markers with a defined radius and fill color for better data point visibility.
